tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE SoilHealthRecommendations (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    farmer_id UUID,
    soil_type VARCHAR(50),
    ph_level FLOAT,
    organic_matter FLOAT,
    nutrients TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE SoilHealthRecommendations (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    soil_type VARCHAR(50),
    ph_level FLOAT,
    nutrient_levels JSON
)

CREATE TABLE PestManagementStrategies (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pest_name VARCHAR(50),
    control_methods VARCHAR(200),
    effectiveness FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE ClimateAdaptationGuidelines (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    region VARCHAR(50),
    recommended_crops JSON,
    temperature_range VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE SoilHealthRecommendations (
  recommendation_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  farmer_id UUID,
  soil_type TEXT,
  pH_level FLOAT,
  organic_matter FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE PestManagementStrategies (
  strategy_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  farmer_id UUID,
  pest_type TEXT,
  recommended_action TEXT,
  effectiveness_rating INT
)

CREATE TABLE ClimateAdaptationGuidelines (
  guideline_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  farmer_id UUID,
  region TEXT,
  recommended_practices TEXT,
  impact_on_yield FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE Farmers (
  farmer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  farmer_name TEXT,
  contact_number TEXT,
  location TEXT,
  farm_size FLOAT
)

CREATE TABLE SoilHealthRecommendations (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  recommendation_text TEXT,
  date_issued DATE
)

CREATE TABLE PestManagementStrategies (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  strategy_name TEXT,
  crop_affected TEXT,
  best_practices TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE ClimateAdaptationGuidelines (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  guideline_name TEXT,
  region_affected TEXT,
  adaptation_methods TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Farmers (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  name TEXT,
  location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Farms (
  id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  farm_name TEXT,
  acres INTEGER
)
